title: What should be keeping Liz Truss awake
description: Liz Truss has a lot on her plate. The United Kingdom is heading for a recession. Workers are going on strike as inflation erodes their living standards. And millions of people and thousands of businesses need immediate relief from soaring energy bills to get through the winter.

title: Australia's tough flu season could spell trouble for the US this winter, especially with Covid-19 in the mix
description: Influenza is always unpredictable. Infectious disease experts like to hedge their forecasts with a caution: When you've seen one flu season, you've seen one flu season.

title: Billionaire investor: Powell would 'say he made a mistake' with inflation
description: David Rubenstein, Co-Founder of The Carlyle Group, hired Fed chairman Jerome Powell more than two decades ago. Today, he says Powell would admit the Fed underestimated inflation and that more unemployment would help combat inflation.

title: Palestinian killed and 16 others injured by Israeli troops in West Bank demolition operation
description: A Palestinian man was shot dead and 16 others were wounded during an Israeli military operation in Jenin in the West Bank, the Palestinian Ministry of Health said Tuesday.

title: Fears for babies born into Pakistan's devastating floods
description: It was raining when Kainat Solangi's daughter was born on August 14 and it's barely stopped since, stranding her family in a makeshift tent on a thin strip of land surrounded by Pakistan's worst-ever floods.
